about_the_game:
FEN: Prologue is a new interpretation of the survival genre. After a sequence of unexpected events you find yourself at an unauthorized landfill. The fen where the landfill is located will become your new home. You will have to try hard in order to survive in this horrible place.


Main features of the game:
  • unique set of resources for mining;
  • make your new home more comfortable.
  • discover the surroundings and look for resources.
  • fight with the locals for the right to live.
  • possibility to create unusual tools for survival;
  • procedural world generation;
  • great pixel art graphics.

name: FEN: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 512MB)
